rulesStrings.li: questDescription(deitiesCount[greater_than]1)->[relic_name] of [ideo_name] has been located at a remote site controlled by [faction_name]. You can send a caravan there to destroy [relic_name], and by doing so, the deities of [ideo_name] will lose some of their power.

questDescription(deitiesCount==1)->[relic_name] of [ideo_name] has been located at a remote site controlled by [faction_name]. You can send a caravan there to destroy [relic_name], and by doing so, the deity [deityLabel] of [ideo_name] will lose some of their power.

questDescription(deitiesCount==0)->[relic_name] of [ideo_name] has been located at a remote site controlled by [faction_name]. You can send a caravan there to destroy [relic_name]. Destroy all of [ideo_name]'s relics as well as its altar or ideogram to liberate [faction_name] from its ideology.
